spells.name: Absorb Toxicity
spells.description: You become immune to diseases and toxins, absorb one, and then spread it to others.

spells.name: Obsidian Flow
spells.description: Converts the surface of the ground into molten glass.

spells.name: Protection from Energy, Communal
spells.description: As protection from energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
